column1: This part of my life... this part right here. this is called "happiness".
This part of my life, this part right here, this part is called "being stupid".

Can I say something? Um, I'm the type of person that if you ask me a question and I don't know the answer, I'm gonna tell you that I don't know. But I bet you what, I know how to find the answer and I will find the answer.
I just have two questions for you. What do you do, and how do you do it?To
Don't ever let someone tell you you can't do something. Not even me. All right?
When I was young, and I'd get A's, I'd get this good feeling of all the things that I could be. And then I'd never became any of them.

Hey dad, you wanna hear something funny? There was a man who was drowning, and a boat came, and the man on the boat said "Do you need help?" and the man said "No thanks, God will save me". Then another boat came and he tried to help him,didn't you save me?" and God said "I sent you two big boats, you dummy!"

The important thing about that freedom train, is it's got to climb mountains. We ALL have to climb mountains, you know. Mountains that go way up high, and mountains that go deep and low. Yes, we know what those mountains are here at Glide. We sing about them.
